channel.title: More admins
channel.description:
Hey guys, we have a sufficient number of global moderators/sectional moderators, but personally I believe we need about maybe 1-2 more administrators.
Administrators are HARDLY ever on. It's been nearly 2 weeks since I've seen a admin online. [b]People for the idea[/b]
[ul][li]Yz85Racer[/li] [li]Sonny bill 9[/li] [li]Casey.[/li] [li]Frank_ // Felt inclined to do that[/li] [li]therealjdb[/li][/ul]
[b]People against the idea[/b]
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“JDB`, post:39, topic:173270”]A good example of an emergency would be Pwnd’s rampage today.[/quote]A good example of an emergency would by your rampages yesterday for example.
IRL I would kill you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot

@billygotshot wrote:

no. that is different i believe someone made new groups and put random people into them… something dealing with JDB i guess.

Well… Seems to me we just got a new one yesterday. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=228706

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:60, topic:173270”]Just guessing; but are you trying to promote yourself?

I’m just wondering, being your name is on the top of the list. From forums I’ve been part of the staff on(Kwickfix, RSForums), people aren’t allowed to nominate themselves o.O[/quote]

its a vote to see who supports the idea of having more admins…

Read full topic

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:66, topic:173270”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=233533.msg2002809#msg2002809 date=1200673863]

A good example why, today.

Today’s incident has been reversed.
[/quote]

Almost.

[quote author=Greeny link=topic=233533.msg2001514#msg2001514 date=1200604115]

Any GMod can justify deleting every post on Moparscape anyway since every single thread breaks a rule in some way. Most of them misspell, yous ‘u’ etc. There is a hell load of flame, retarded questions, and unneeded comments all the time.

Pwnd’s actions can be seen as perfectly reasonable, in fact they can be seen as amazing as he took the time to delete a large amount of spam from an impossible to run community.

He also deleted important topics, and even some that weren’t breaking the rules.

But, by banning him[/quote]

What makes you say I banned him? If you must know, it was Freddy1990, or JDB`.[/quote]

I didn’t say you :P. I’m fairly sure I spoke out as if I was addressing the whole staff. Sorry if you misinterpreted.

Read full topic

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I love how people are “hating” silab because she makes money of you lot, moparisthebest makes money off you lot, infact 1000s of people make money off you lot. Google ads.

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

We need more mod’s on moparscape forums.Most topic’s are deleted and everyone is quitting+Everyone is getting mad about the download’s section seeing as most of them were resolved after Pwned’s attack now jbd’s?Silabsoft is muted and really no one like’s her.I say Ikiliki and niall are the most active mod’s on moparscape.

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Exception, post:58, topic:173270”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=233533.msg2001534#msg2001534 date=1200605603]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=234255/2000275#2000275
i agree, as you can see i was warned for basically nothing, since that was in no way flaming.
[/quote]
WHAT THE FUCK?
The staff are clearly corrupt retarded unable to remove their heads from their arses.[/quote]

Err, how about no?

The warning was done wrong, considering staff need to show some backbone in their job and brush insults off. If a staff member cannot take an insult/flame then they should not be a staff member.

Read full topic

item.title: More admins
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:54, topic:173270”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=233533.msg2001514#msg2001514 date=1200604115]

Any GMod can justify deleting every post on Moparscape anyway since every single thread breaks a rule in some way. Most of them misspell, yous ‘u’ etc. There is a hell load of flame, retarded questions, and unneeded comments all the time.

Pwnd’s actions can be seen as perfectly reasonable, in fact they can be seen as amazing as he took the time to delete a large amount of spam from an impossible to run community.

He also deleted important topics, and even some that weren’t breaking the rules.

But, by banning him it looks like you’d all prefer to have the Moparscapers rather than Pwnd. It’s fucking ridiculous. Remove GMod perhaps but seriously, Pwnd has alot more good karma than bad karma (so to speak). The only reason people support moparscape is because it makes a shit ton of money.

The staff are clearly corrupt retarded.
[/quote]fixt[/quote]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=234255/2000275#2000275
i agree, as you can see i was warned for basically nothing, since that was in no way flaming.

Read full topic

The staff are clearly corrupt retarded.[/quote]fixt
